questions.quote: Kramer, I need those cufflinks, but now they're in the box, and the key is in the bird... What are we gonna do?
What d'you mean it doesn't work? You get enough bottles together...
Oh no, no,. no. I had to fish around in the evidence room for it. You know, they're all preoccupied, trying to hunt down this new psycho-serial killer, the Lopper. All right, I'll see ya.
Man, Ughhhh, wwwheh.… I just came from Roy's. I threw up from the gas.
Hello Margery, George Costanza. How are you sweet heart? Listen, can you give Mr. Thomassoulo a message for me? …Yes. If he needs me, tell him  I'M IN MY OFFICE! Thanks.
Yeah.  Sit down there.  Hello, Jerry.  I believe you know Nina.
We just got the Citibank account. In fact today was our first big meeting with them.
Anyway, I think the guy in the shower opposite saw me. He gave me a dirty look.
Yeah I did. He was very talented. He was, ah just, I don't know a little too...
You've selected ... Agent Zero? If that's correct, press one.
